author: perrotta
body:
CMSHLT-85: Update hltElectronVertex module configuration
CMSHLT-86: Update of the muon reconstruction and isolation in HLT paths

One path in the Run2 HLT menu got renamed (see CMSHLT-86):
HLT_DoubleMu4NoFilters_Jpsi_Displaced -> HLT_DoubleMu4_Jpsi_Displaced
title: Updates to the Run2 HLT menu as in CMSHLT-85 and CMSHLT-86
